div.p:
Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per prepositum et balliuos eiusdem xo die
mensis Julij Anno Domini mo iiijco lxxxmo

Quo die de consensu prepositi et consilij Andreas Wode filius Johannis Wode
Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi racione
paterne libertatis pro v s' datis preposito in alba bursa prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die Alexander bonetmakar conuictus per assisam adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie
pro iniusta perturbacione dominj andree de camera capellani / et tenetur emen
dare eidem ad visum proborum virorum

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xijo die mensis et
annj predictorum /

quo die subscripti electi fuerunt et Jurati in assisam videlicet Alexander
howison Johannes Waus iunior Dauid de Kintor Johannes glenmalvine gilbertus
leche Dauid symson alexander rede gilbertus morison macolmus mowet Dauid colison'
Willelmus hay /

TheThis whole entry has been deleted. samyn dai comperit before the ballies sittand in Jugement Androw branche
with his forspekar' Alexander menyes the quhilk askit at the balyeis / that thai
throu the autorite of thare office sulde caus' and ger tho

The samen dai gilbert Riburne folowit be Androw branche and accusit be
the ballies of the wrangwis' strublance of the said androw vndir nycht / de
nyit / the said chalance and was made quyte tharof be the assise aboue writin

Item becaus' the said gilbert rehersit / that it wes sayde be diuers' persons that he wes
a nychtwalkar / he desirit a knaulage tharof and deliuerence of the samyn assise /
the quhilk deliuerit be alexander rede forspekar' of the assise / that the said gilbert
wes quyte of al nychtwalking et cetera

The xiij dai of Julij the yer' before writin It wes statute ordanit and concludit be the
aldirman consel and mony of the brethir of the gilde of this burgh / that gif ony man settis his
wattir til ony vthir of the toune / and pais nocht his mail to the ballies quhen it is
askit him at the tyme of the chekker / gif he that takis the watir pais the mail
tharof to the ballies for him that set him the tak of the wattir and in defaute of his
awne payment that aw the tak / he sal remayn with the tak of that watir for
that nixt yere in tocum for siclike price as he had it of before et cetera

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xvijo
die Julij anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo

Quo die Alexander Rede deuenit plegius legalis pro Alexandro forbes et tho
ma de camera quod Andreas branche et pars sua erit indempnis de
ipsis alexandro et thoma et partibus suis aliter quam per viam Juris / Et quod faciet
dictos Alexandrum et thomam coram dictis ballivis in curia huius burgi comparere
super premunicione quindecim responsurus et Juri periturus

Eodem die Robertus de Kyntor deuenit plegius legalis pro Andrea
branche quod alexander forbes et thomas de camera et partes sue
erint indempnes et imperturbati de ipso Andrea et parte sua aliter quam
per viam Juris

Item eodem die Alexander de camera prepositus huius burgi Inuenit Dauid mathei
plegium legalem pro eo quod Alexander meignes et pars sua erunt indempnes de
eo et parte sua aliter quam Jura volunt

Item eodem die Alexander meignes dedit thomam fife plegium legalem pro eo
quod Alexander de camera de murchil prepositus et pars sua erunt indempnes de
ipso et parte sua aliter quam Jura requirunt

Item eodem die thomas fife deuenit plegius legalis pro Alexandro menyes quod alexander
forbes et thomas de camera et pars sua erunt indempnes de eo et parte
sua aliter quam Jura volunt

Et Alexander rede deuenit plegius legalis pro alexandro forbes et thoma chaumer
quod Alexander menyes et pars sua erunt indempnes de ipsis et partibus suis
aliter quam per viam Juris

Item eodem die Dauid menyes germanus dicti alexandri Inuenit Jacobum craik plegium
legalem quod alexander forbes et thomas chavmer et pars sua erunt indempnes de eo
et parte sua aliter quam Jura requirunt

Et prefati alexander forbes et thomas de camera inuenerunt Alexandrum rede plegium legalem
quod Dauid menyes et pars sua erunt indempnes pro ipsis et partibus suis
aliter quam Jura volunt

Item Johannes Waus inuenit Willelmum de Kintor plegium legalem quod Alexander forbes et
thomas chamer et pars sua erunt indempnes de eo et parte sua aliter quam Jura volunt

Et Alexander rede deuenit plegius legalis pro dictis alexandro forbes et thoma de camera
de indempnitate dicti Johannis Waus et partis sue aliter quam per viam Juris

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xviij die Julij anno Domini supradicto Andreas ramsay
prosecutus fuit per plegium Relictam thome culan de iniusta detencione xvj s' vj d' / et dicta
relicta per prelocutorem suum dominum Alexandrum club peciit diem legittimum ad respondendum / que dies sibi
assignatur ad diem lune ad octo dies responsurus ut Jura volunt

The xix dai of Julij the yer' et cetera lxxx In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene
be thomas prat ane of the balyeis of the samyn Johne besat duelland in montros cha
lansit androw atkyn' as he that hyrit a meyr of his and Androw murra yungar' for the
spilling and hurting of hir in the ryding of hir / throu the quhilkis he wantis his
mere / and that the saidis persons acht til wprycht and assith him for hir The quhilk wes
put to the decision' and knaulage of a sworn' assise / the quhilk assise riply avi
sit fand and deliuerit be Richard hil forspekar of the assise / that the saidis androw atkyn' and
androw murray had done that thai acht todo anent the hyring and ryding of the said mere
declarand thaim quyte of the said Johannis chalance tweching the said meyr et cetera

The xxj dai of Julij the yer' forsaid the consale of abirdene and diuers' of the gilde of the
quhilkis part of thir names ar vndirwritin decretit and deliuerit / that Johne Wormot sal
pay his wattir mail for him self and for Johne of Kintor becaus' he fischis
his wattir / and nocht hald it for ony clame of det clamyt be him of the aldirman
Alexander of chamer / considering that it is ordanit and akit mony yeris bigane / and now
affermyt / that na man sal poynd or hald his mail for ony vthir action or clame
And thir ar the names of the persons that war present / Alexander menyes John' of marr' John'
of Knollis Dauid colison Robert of culan Dauid symson James comyng Alexander rede
thomas prat Dauid mathoson gilbert morison Alexander the hay William the hay Johne
stewart William blindsel yungar' Edmond louson Dauid marr' Androw Wenton
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxvj die Julij anno quo supra

the quhilk dai Johne fichet yungar accusit for the breking of common ordinance in the
stopping and halding of the wattir fra the nethirmyln' and for fyling of the burn' the said
John' put him in wil of the aldirman and balyeis tharof / quharfor he was adiugit in amercia
ment of the court and til forber' in tym tocum
Item the said John fichet be his awn' grant in amerciament for the strublans of thom of myl

The samen dai before the aldirman and balyeis sittand in Jugement Dauid howison
oblisit him be the faith of his body his hand wphaldin til content and pay til tho
mas prat xij li' xix s' acht be him to the said thomas within a moneth nixt tocum
but langar delay

Item the said dai In presence of the aldirman and balyeis in the court It is appointit and accordit
betuix Alexander stewart and John' of culan as procuratouris and factouris to James Innes
lard of that ilk on theta part / And William elyot francheman of Deip anent xxx
li' of the vsual monee of Scotland acht be him to the said lard of Innes / for vj
dakir of hidis and iijc skynnis on the tothir part / that is tosay / the said William eliot has
deliuerit til the saidis Alexander and John' in the name and on the behalf of the lard of
Innes viij pypis of wad in plege of the said some' / And gif the said franchman
contentis and pais nocht the forsaid some' of xxx li' in vsuale monee of Scotland
to the lard of Innes his procuratouris or factouris be paisch nixt tocum / the saidis
viij pypis of wad sal remayn with the lard of Innes as bocht and sald for
the forsaid some' of xxx li'

Item the said dai In the action movit be Alexander the hay and androw Wenton againis John' sym
son the assise tharupon chosin and sworn ordanit and deliuerit be gilbert the Waus
forspekar of the assise / that gif the said Johne symson has deliuerit as he sais the
billis that he ressauit of the saidis alexander and androw til loyk laris portar of brugis
on the behalf of alexander hay and androw Wenton' anent xv li' g' pertening to thaim liand
in the hand of Johne camby lumbard / the said Johne symson is fre and quyte of thar'
clame And gif it beis fundin that he deliuerit nocht the said billis to loyk laris on the
behalf of thaim as said is / quhat scathe that the saidis alexander and Androw sustenis in
the defaute of the deliuerence of the said billis / the said John' symson sal wprycht and
assithe thaim tharof /

The xxvij dai of Julij the yer' of god et cetera lxxx In the tolbuthe of abirdene before
the aldirman ballies and diuers' of the consale / Dauid howy is oblist be the faith of
his body til content and pay til Robert blindsel ane of the ballies of this burgh on
the behalf of William lutar his gude fadir and of mage branche his modir and for
him self / thre hambre barellis of salmond / betuix this and lammes nix cum a
yere next eftir folowand the date of this write / be for the outred and payment
of thare wattir mail of half a net of the pot / and certane siluer pait to thaim be the
said Robert to thar' vtilite and proffite the tym of the making of this write

Vltimo die Julij anno quo supra In pretorio burgi de abirdene coram thoma prat vno
ballivorum eiusdem personaliter comparens thomas gray frater et heres quondam Dauid gray burgensis dicti
burgi fecit constituit et ordinavit honorabilem virum Georgium forbes de auchintoule
suum verum legittimum et irreuocabilem procuratorem actorem factorem et deputatum specialem
ad prosequendum petendum recipiendum et recuperandum nomine ipsius constituentis omnia bona heredita
ria eidem pertinen' per decessum quondam dicti Dauidis fratris sui / ac omnia Jura sua que habet
aut habere poterit virtute hereditatis prefati quondam fratris sui defuncti / et ad agendum pro se in pre
missis prout ordo Juris exigit et requirit / Et promisit de Rato de Judicio sisti et Judicatum
solui obligando se fidemedia ad subeundum et perimplendum omnia et singula que dictus eius
procurator in premissis duxerit faciend' sine reuocacione Testibus Alexandro de camera filio et appa
renti herede Alexandri de camera de murchil andrea vrry de petfechy Dauid forbes domino
Jacobo forbes notario publico Dauid galichtly domino andrea chamer capellano Willelmo
paterson' Willelmo scrymgeour et thoma Johneson' cum diuersis aliis
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vij die Augusti anno predicto

quo die decretum fuit et deliberatum per assisam iuratam quod Johannes balcromby tenetur
liberare Johannem symson de duobus pety quarteriis salis in li crayer Johannis symonson de le
fer et idem Johannes balcromby adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento quia iniuste negavit liberare dictum Johannem
symson de eisdem

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xjo die Augusti anno Dominj Mmo
iiijco lxxxmo /

quo die Johannes mowet per prelocutorem suum Willelmum blindsele iuniorem calumpniavit Alexandrum
gibson manens in Dysart pro eo quod iniuste detinet octo grossos anglicanos et duos dena
rios anglicanos ab ipso Johanne / quj quondam Alexander negavit dictum debitum / Vnde dictus Johannes manu
cepit ad probandum hoc et peciem sibi diem ad hoc assignari et ballivi assignauerunt eidem hodie
ad xx dies si dies illa iuridica fuerit alioquin proximum diem Juridicum inde sequen' pro dicta proba
cione facienda / plegio Alexandro sanchar' pro introitu prefati alexandri gibson' die limitato / et pro solucione
dicte summe si optenta fuerit et cetera

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene xij die Augusti anno Dominj supradicto
Willelmus quelp accusatus de iniusta perturbacione Johannis Dys' binis vicibus
et vxoris sue ac de perturbio Dauid tod / negauit iniustam perturbacionem eorundem vnde
hoc fuit positum ad assisam proborum burgensium videlicet Johannis Waus senioris Willelmi hay alexandri
nachty Johannis vaus iunioris henrici owrum Johannis de tulidef et thome gardnare
quj Jurati et mature auisati dixerunt quod Willelmus quelp iniuste perturbavit dictas personas
vt premittitur et Ideo adiudicatur in iiijor amerciamentis curie et emendare partibus lesis ut Jura volunt
Et dictus Johannes Dys quitus factus fuit per assisam de perturbacione iniusta Willelmi quelp

Joneta Dys et margareta quelp ipsarum quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbacione adinuicem prout compertum fuit
per assisam

Andreas lammynton conuictus per dictam assisam amerciatur quia iniuste perturbavit Alexandrum lammynton'
fratrem suum / pro quibus Dauid mathei deuenit plegius legalis videlicet quod alter erit indempnis
de altro aliter quam per viam Juris

xiiij die Augusti anno quo supra In pretorio huius burgi coram Jacobo comyng vno balliuorum
eiusdem Alexander gibson nauta constituit gilbertum Waus et Alexandrum sanchar' suos procu
ratores coniunctim et divisim in causa mota per Johannem mowet contra et aduersus ipsum Alexandrum gibson'
et ad agendum et defendendum pro eo prout Jura volunt Ipso promittens de Rato de Judicio
sisti et Judicatum soluj et cetera

The samyn dai martyne turnour schipman producit be Johne mowet as ane of
his previs in the action aboue writin and admyttit be Alexander gibson / the gret aith
sworn before James cummyng ane of the balyeis in presence of the saidis partiis / de
ponis and declaris be his aith . that he knawis nocht quheythir the said Alexander gibson'
aw til John' mowet viij inglis grottis and ij inglis d' or nocht / for he sais that he
wes nocht in the Realm in the tym / bot that he herd John' mowet clame and him deny

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xvij die Augusti anno Domini
mo iiijco lxxxmo /

quo die Alexander sanchar obligatur preposito et ballivis per extensione manus
sue ad satisfaciendum xviij s' debitis Willelmo rate infra xxj dies proximo futuro

The samen dai It wes fundin and deliuerit be ane assise that henry adamson fischar did
nocht that he acht todo til Alexander Westland becaus' he passit wrangusly fra his
bate and seruice / quharapon the assise has ordanit that gif it be fundin in tym cuming
that the said henry or ony vthir fischar' pas wrangusly fra his maistir bate and
seruice that he salbe tane and put in the tolbuthe / and his lyne tane fra him and
haldin / quhil he vprycht the scaith and the tende bath

Eodem die Simon de gardin accusatus de iniusta perturbacione Mariote menyes
sponse Andree rettre / et Johannis glenmalvin filius / negavit et conuictus fuit per assisam proborum
burgensium ad hoc Juratam et Ideo adiudicatur in ijobus amerciamentis pro perturbio eorundem / et tenetur
emendare partibus lesis ad visum proborum virorum / Vnde assisa ordinavit quod dictus Simon
corrigere et reparare faciet certa vasa dicte mariote in quam dampnificavit eadem quinque
dabit dimidium petre cere ad lumen beati nicholai

gilbertus morison conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbio fergusij blycht et vxoris sue in verbo
et eadem vxor in amerciamento quia perturbavit eundem gilbertum verbo et cetera

Item quia quedam Alizona et cristiana obiurgabantur et brigauerunt adinuicem Iniungitur eis per
ballivos ex deliberacione assise / quod de cetero desistat' a tali perturbio sub pena in imposicionis
earundem in li goif

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxj die Augusti anno Domini
supra dicto /

quo die Simon de gardin adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta detencione xl petrarum lane
a Willelmo rettre prout compertum fuit per assisam que deliberavit quod dictus Simon tenetur liberare
thomam prat de plegiagio in quo ipsum traxit dicto Willelmo de dictis xl petris lane
infra terminum Juris

Eodem die assisa decreuit et datum fuit pro Judicio quod Willelmus brown' tenetur satisfacere Andree
culan de xij s' infra quindenam futuram

The samen dai thir personis of consale vndirwritin that is tosay John' of marr' Johne of Knollis
Dauid colison Robert blindsel Dauid symson Alexander rede William blindsel yungar thom
prat gilbert of chavmer William the hay Dauid mathoson Adam of crafurd Sym of
crafurd Alexander nachti macolm mowet Alexander of chamer the son androw culan William of
rettre John' stewart androw rettre gilbert lech Sym of gardin and Alexander angusson' burgez
the quhilkis personis has consentit and deliuerit / that gif ony common gude may be fundin
betuix this and Witsonday next tocum til content and pay Alexander of chavmer aldirman in the tym
to the avale of ellevyn pundis xvj s' and j d' acht til him be the toune as
is fundin be the auditouris of his compt / that is tosay Johne of marr' John'
of Knollis Dauid colison Robert of culan Alexander rede Robert blindsel James
comyng and Dauid mathoson / It salbe raisit and payit til him / And failyeand
tharof / It salbe allowit til him in his mail of the tackis that he has
in ferme of the toune of Abirdene of the erast termez et cetera
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene xxv die Augusti anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo

quo die Johannes stewart per confessionem propriam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione
Alexandri rede in verbo et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum virorum

Eodem die Johannes stewart conuictus per assisam proborum burgensium adiudicatur in duobus amerciamentis quia
iniuste perturbavit thomam fife Abbatem de boneacord huius ville et Andream murref seniorem
et tenetur emendare eiusdem ut Jura volunt

Curia burgi abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem primo die mensis Septembris anno
Dominj supradicto

The quhilk dai It wes decretit and deliuerit be ane sworn' assise Johne the Waus
eldar beand taillis man of the samyn / that gif George browne wil fynde souertie til
Alexander Watson' for til pay his mail of his forland terme be terme / and for the
vphalding of the samyn land the said george sal remain with the said land eftir
the tenour of the compromyis made betuix thame / And failyeand of the said souertie
the said alexander Watson' salhaf regres til his awne land.

In curia burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per Robertum blindsel vnium ballivorum eiusdem iiijto die Septem
bris anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo / Willelmus goddisman conuictus per assisam amerciatur quia iniuste perturbavit Johannem
seruitorem Angusij ihonson et tenetur emendare eidem ad visum proborum virorum
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene v die mensis et annj predictorum

The quhilk dai Alexander sanchar grantit before the ballies that he borowit a bow pertening
til ser William Donaldson chamerlan of Abirdene / the quhilk bow the ballies chargit him
til restore and deliuer til the said ser William within xv dais nixt tocum

Item the samen dai William blindsel ane of the ballies assignit til Dauid galichtly this
dai xv dais topreve that Johne skynner' drew him borch for ij merkis til Androw malcom
of the fery becaus' the said Johne denyit his clame And the said Dauid askit that the said John'
suld be producit as for the first witnes / the quhilk the gret aith sworn' deponit
and declarit / that he drew the said Dauid borch condicionaly that is tosay gif the said
Johne warnit the said Androw malcom be a dai made betuix thaim / that he suld mak
na travale with his bote / the said John' doand this suld be dischargit of the
said some' of twa merkis
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vj die Septembris anno et cetera lxxx

quo die margreta coly et Agnes allirdas amerciantur pro perturbio adinuicem prout compertum fuit
per assisam et emendabunt sibi adinuicem ad visum proborum virorum

In the balye court haldin in the tolbuth the ix dai of september forsaid Aly byrs and gudy
hukstar ilkane in amerciament be thir awn' grant for the wranguis' bying of peris and fruyt
in vndeu tym et cetera and thai ar chargit toforber' in tym tocum

Item cristian hukstar in ane vnlau throu hir awn' grant for bying of fruyt rychtsa and of
cheis' butyr and eggis et cetera

In curia legali tenta in pretorio per ballivos xj die mensis et annj supradictis quedam mario
ria conuicta per assisam amerciatur quia iniuste percussit quandam margaretam et tenetur emendare
ad visum proborum virorum
Et prefata margareta conuicta fuit de perturbio dicte mariorie in verbo

xviij die Septembris anno quo supra / Robertus yungson ewynson Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde huius burgi ex gracia prepositi et quorundam consilij in fauorem patricij badenach
et vxoris sue / cuius vxoris filiam dictus Robertus desponsabit / et dedit preposito v s' in alba
bursa / prestito solito Juramento

Die xix die mensis et annj supradictorum Jacobus andree filius quondam Johannis andree commorantis
in lunkfurde de consensu diuisorum consilij Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fra
trem gilde huius burgi prestito solito Juramento / pro qua libertate soluet preposito nomine communitatis
quatuor marcas plegio Waltero thome thomas prat fatebatur se solut' de dicta summa ex parte prepositi

Eodem die gilbertus riburne aurifaber ex gracia consilij factus fuit liber bur
gensis et frater gilde huius burgi racione paterne libertatis pro v s' in alba bursa datis
preposito et prestitit solitum Juramentum

The samyn dai In the tolbuthe of the burgh of abirdene before Robert blindsel tho
mas prat and William blindsel thre of the ballies of this said burgh sittand in Juge
ment Comperit Alexander of chavmer aldirman of abirdene on the behalf of his
spous' and of Dauy symson his man and seruitour as forspekar for him thare beand
present And askit thomas prat and William blindsel twa of the forsaidis ballies
that thai wald of thar office ger Androw branch comper' til ansuer' and vndirly the
law for the wrangwis' strublans of his wif and man forsaid / like as
he had requirit thaim yisterday tilhaf tane souertie of the said androw branch
tharupon' And in defaute of comperans of the said androw / Alexander of chaumer
aldirman forsaid has requirit Robert blindsel the thrid ballie like as
he did the tothir twa of before / topas and tak souertie of the said Androw
branch tocomper' on the morn' toanswer wpon the said strublance as
law wil

Die vicesima mensis Septembris anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo Alexander de camera prepositus de consensu diuersorum
consilij et fratrem gilde / Recepit Ricardum de craufurd filium quondam patricij craufurd olim
in Dere commorans in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi / quia prestitit solitum
Juramentum et dabit pro libertate sua iiijor marcas plegio thoma prat

Eodem die coram Willelmo blindsel vno ballivorum in curia sedente dominus Alanus de camera ca
pellanus ex parte mariote guthery tunc presentis peciit certa bona a Nicholaio baxtar
dicte mariote spectan' et eedum legat' per quondam cristianam preston' / quj Nicholaius peciit diem
legalem ad respondendum qui dies sibi conceditur hodie ad quindenam
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die mensis et annj surpadictorum

quo die thomas narn conuictus per assisam amerciatur quia iniuste perturbavit Johannem lammynton' et tenetur
emendare eidem ad visum proborum hominum

Willelmus buchan in amerciamento pro perturbio alexandri glutery pistoris et emendare tenetur vt supra
Et idem Willelmus inuenit Willelmum moore plegium legalem de indempnitate dicti alexandri / Et georgius broun'
deuenit plegio pro alexandro glutery quod Willelmus buchan erit indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris

In curia ballivorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxvj die Septembris
anno quo supra / Dauid mathei porrexit plegium quod Johannes stevinson iniuste detinet ab
eo xxxiij s' vij d' ad bonum compotum et dictus Johannes peciit diem legalem ad respondendum / et

Johannes blithnes et Johannes og quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbio et lesione alter alterius et emenda
bunt sibi inuicem ad visum proborum hominum

Vltimo die mensis Septembris anno et cetera lxxxmo Gilbertus de garuiach frater Willelmi de
garuiach burgensis huius burgi Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde dicti
burgi de abirdene de consensu prepositi et consilij ad instanciam prouidi viri domini Andree
thome capellanj cuj promissum fuit habere liberum burgensem racione laborum suorum fact'
et faciend' in organorum laudibus ad cultum et laudem dei omnipotentis in ecclesia beati
nicholai huius burgi / quj quidem gilbertus solitum prestitit Juramentum

Secundo die octobris anno quo supra Alexander towny scissor Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem
huius burgi tantum ad instanciam Alexandri de camera filius ex gracia consilij prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die Johannes colison filius et apparens heres Dauid colison Receptus fuit in liberum bur
gensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi racione paterne libertatis pro v s' datis preposito prestito Juramento

Item eodem die Alexander Irvin filius et apparens heres nobilis viri Alexandri Irvin de Drum
vicecomitis deputati de Abirdene / et magister Andreas cadiow Recepti fuerunt in liberos bur
genses et confratres gilde huius burgi causa libertatis paterne / pro v s' per ipsorum quemlibet solitis preposito
suorum quilibet Juramentum prestitit solitum et consuet' et cetera
